Scenario Description
Verify that the user can successfully update their profile name
column5: User is logged into their Instagram account and on the profile edit page
column6: Change the profile name and click "Save"
column7: Profile name should be updated successfully

column3: Verify that the user can successfully update their username
column5: User is logged in and on the profile edit page
column7: Username should be updated if available; otherwise, an error should be shown

column3: Verify that the user can successfully update their bio
column5: User is logged in and on the profile edit page
column7: Updated bio should be visible on the profile page

column3: Verify that the user can successfully update their profile picture
column5: User is logged in and on the profile edit page
column6: Click "Change Profile Picture," select a valid image, and save
column7: Profile picture should be updated successfully

column3: Verify validation messages for username when using special characters
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Enter a username with special characters (*&^%) and save
column7: System should show an error message stating "Invalid username format"

column3: Verify email update and validation process
column5: User is logged in and on the profile edit page
column6: Change the email address and save
column7: A verification email should be sent; update should be completed after verification

column3: Verify that the user cannot update their profile with an already existing username
column5: User is logged in and on the profile edit page
column6: Enter a username that is already taken and save
column7: System should display an error message "Username is already taken"

column3: Verify password update functionality
column5: User is logged in and on the profile settings page
column6: Enter the old password, new password, confirm new password, and save
column7: Password should be updated successfully, and the user should be prompted to log in again

column3: Verify updating multiple fields at once
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Change name, username, bio, and profile picture together and save
column7: All changes should be updated successfully

column3: Verify UI/UX – Buttons and labels should be properly visible
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Check the alignment and visibility of buttons, input fields, and messages
column7: All UI elements should be properly aligned and readable

column3: Verify the character limit for the bio field
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Enter a bio longer than 150 characters and save
column7: System should restrict input and show an error message

column3: Verify the file format validation for profile picture upload
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Try uploading an unsupported file format (e.g., .exe, .pdf)
column7: System should show an appropriate error message

column3: Verify boundary value – Minimum & maximum username length
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Enter a username with the minimum (e.g., 3 chars) and maximum allowed length (e.g 30 chars)
column7: System should accept usernames within the defined range

column3: Verify response when the user tries to update the profile with an invalid email format
column5: User is on the profile edit page
column6: Enter an invalid email (e.g "test@com") and save
column7: System should show a validation error

column3: Verify performance – Profile update under high server load
column5: Multiple users are simultaneously updating profiles
column6: Simulate multiple profile updates at the same time
column7: System should respond smoothly without delays

column3: Verify the session timeout when updating the profile
column5: User is logged in for a long time
column6: Try updating the profile after session timeout
column7: System should prompt the user to log in again

column3: Verify changes are reflected in the user’s Instagram profile
column6: Go to the user’s profile and check the updated details
column7: Changes should reflect correctly on the profile page
